Class AbstractLocalReader

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProxyReader, NameableConfigurable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractThreadedLocalReader

    public abstract class AbstractLocalReader
extends AbstractObservableReader
    Manage the loop processing for SeRequest transmission in a set and for SeResponse reception in a set

        public abstract void checkOrOpenPhysicalChannel()
                                         throws IOReaderException
        Checks the presence of a physical channel. Creates one if needed, generates an exception in case of failure.

      • transmitApdu

        public abstract java.nio.ByteBuffer transmitApdu(java.nio.ByteBuffer apduIn)
                                          throws ChannelStateReaderException
        Transmits a single APDU and receives its response. The implementation of this abstract method must handle the case where the SE response is 61xy and execute the appropriate get response command
        Parameters:
        apduIn - byte buffer containing the ingoing data
        Returns:
        apduResponse byte buffer containing the outgoing data.
        Throws:
        ChannelStateReaderException

      • getAlternateFci

        public abstract java.nio.ByteBuffer getAlternateFci()
        Return a pseudo FCI when no application selection is possible (e.g. ATR from CSM) The FCI data buffer ends with SW1Sw2=9000
        Returns:
        FCI data
